system.summary: Change the form of belief granted by your Clerical Approach.

description.value: To change your character’s form of belief, you must reach a philosophical breakthrough as a Long Rest Action. When you do, you lose access to the trait of your previous @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.RVBAX8AXLOK0TRYA]{Clerical Approach}, and may choose another one. This process is mentally taxing, and you cannot make the change again until 1 month after choosing a @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.RVBAX8AXLOK0TRYA]{Clerical Approach}.
